This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Test that the (x, y, z) values for CSSScale are correct. 
PASS Test that the is2D values for CSSScale is correct. 
PASS Test that the cssText for CSSScale is correct. 
PASS Test that invalid number of arguments for CSSScale throws an exception. 
PASS Test that invalid input throws an exception. 
PASS Test that asMatrix is constructed correctly for CSSScale. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
